resources.string: Hi, my name is Fikri Nazeef Bin Jasni. I live in Klang, Selangor. I have completed my Diploma in Programming at Polytechnic Sultan Mizan Zainal Abidin, Terengganu. Currently pursuing my studies at UiTM Arau. A person who love to plays Futsal and Extreme Sports ! Hit me up at fikrinazeef14@gmail.com Thank You and Stay Safe !
